nima 0.5.1

R/nima

The personal R package of Nima Hejazi

Author: Nima Hejazi

What’s nima?

R/nima is a miscellaneous collection of tools that have proven useful to me over years of statistical research and scientific computing. This package is made public for my own convenience, with no guarantees whatsoever – caveat emptor: use nima only at your own risk. Since this R package is a quite eclectic collection of tools, consider consulting the website accompanying the package here.

Installation

Install a recent stable release from CRAN:

install.packages("nima")

Install the stable development version from GitHub via devtools:

devtools::install_github("nhejazi/nima")

Issues

If you encounter any bugs or have any specific feature requests, please file an issue.
